1002.name: Journal Scrap #2
1002.info: Explains the Golden Walnuts on the island, which can be used as a currency for Parrots.

1003.name: Journal Scrap #3
1003.info: The Slingshot can be used to shoot down and collect a Golden Walnut on the east side of the Volcano.

1004.name: Journal Scrap #4
1004.info: The map depicts an area just north of Birdie's hut. Digging here will yield a Quality Bobber and a Golden Walnut.

1005.name: Journal Scrap #5
1005.info: Floor 10 of the Volcano has a forge that can be used to enhance tools.

1006.name: Journal Scrap #6
1006.info: The map depicts an area southeast of the Island Farmhouse. Digging here will reveal a Pearl and a Golden Walnut.

1009.name: Journal Scrap #9
1009.info:
On rainy days a Mermaid will appear on the large rock by the shore. If the player places Flute Blocks and tunes them to play the Mermaid's song, she will reward them with 5 Golden Walnuts.
To play the Mermaid's song, place a Flute Block on top or below each set of stones on the shore, then tune each block by the amount of stones. A large stone symbolizes 5, and a small stone symbolizes 1. After tuning all 5 blocks, simply run past each one from left-to-right. Note that the player does not need to have read the journal scrap to do this.

1010.name: Journal Scrap #10
1010.info: After finding Journal Scrap 10, digging at the spot shown outside the Volcano will yield an Ostrich Egg and a Golden Walnut.
